definition: to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情報機構策劃了一項暗殺陸軍部長的重大計劃。

sentences.english: We furiously exclaimed upon the wickedness of the plot they conspired against our company.
sentences.chinese: 我們憤怒譴責他們對我們公司策劃的陰謀。

sentences.english: Napoleon planned to strike a quick blow at his old enemy.
sentences.chinese: 拿破倫策劃對他的宿敵實施迅雷不及掩耳的打擊。

sentences.english: They are brewing a plot behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在幕後策劃一個陰謀。

sentences.english: They all curate exhibitions, publish books and catalogs , and organize conferences and symposia.
sentences.chinese: 他們策劃展覽，出版書籍和手冊，組織會議和論壇。

sentences.english: Submit the plan book to SD 15days before the activity starts.
sentences.chinese: 告知社團着手設計活動策劃書。

sentences.english: A group of chickens are planning to escape Tweedy's Farm.
sentences.chinese: 一羣特威迪農場的小雞正在策劃逃往。

sentences.english: Nostradamus , his son, and his assistant set the whole thing up.
sentences.chinese: 諾查丹馬斯，他的兒子，和助手策劃了整個事件。

sentences.english: At one point, he even demanded to know who was behind the killing of JFK.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至一度要求知道是誰策劃謀殺了肯尼迪總統。

sentences.english: They are probably the most famous party planners in the world.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們可能是全球最出名的派對策劃公司了。

sentences.english: The government's detention of Ai Weiwei appears to have been carefully planned.
sentences.chinese: 政府拘留艾未未的過程似乎經周密策劃。

sentences.english: Q/HSE Department is responsible for daily planning and management improvement activities.
sentences.chinese: HSE部負責對日常改進活動的策劃和管理。

sentences.english: He counciled and probably participated in the murder of darnley in 1567 .
sentences.chinese: 他策劃並很可能參與了1567年謀殺達恩利的事。

sentences.english: The riot was said that it was organized by illegal organizations of outside border.
sentences.chinese: 這次暴亂據悉是由境外非法組織策劃的。

sentences.english: Are you an INTJ also known as The Scientist, The Mastermind, or The Explorer?
sentences.chinese: 你是一個INTJ，亦稱科學家，策劃者，或探索者？

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
